A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Underwhelming\, confusing and disappointing\, The Last Jedi is a comparable slap in the face to the far more coherent and interesting narrative of The Force Awakens. Despite being the longest Star Wars film\, it felt like a lot of the scenes could have been cut\, especially the big excursion which turned out to be a fruitless prank anyway - it wasn't fun or overly surprisingly. And the stuff with Luke? That tops it all. A film should be able to make sense\, but I am still incredibly confused and diappointed in the end of the film. It really is a shame the franchise has dipped so noticeably.
